ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Why Did You Start a Bard?
ygData.msgSnippet: You would also think that they test stuff or at least listen to the folks who do. Well, not if you have been playing EQ for very long - they dont test well at
ygData.messageBody:
You would also think that they test stuff or at least listen to the folks
who do. Well, not if you have been playing EQ for very long - they dont test
well at all - who knows why - never have - maybe never will.

This whole Selos problem *was reported one the Test server*! Way before the
recent patch. It was a reported problem on Test.

Sylly


-----Original Message-----
From: Rebecca Small [mailto:rsmall@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 11, 2001 10:50 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] RE: Why Did You Start a Bard?


I recall that everytime they tinker with snare/root, Selos breaks. You'd
think someone somewhere would have a Sticky note: check bard speed when
changing root/snare!

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
